summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Neighborhood Parks, Green Spaces, Trails and Zoo Levy; authorizing the acquisition of real property commonly known as 8th & Madison; otherwise known as Lots 2 and 3, Block 54, Terry's First Addition to the Town of Seattle, according to the plat thereof recorded in Volume 1 of Plats, page 49, in King County, Washington; authorizing acceptance of the deed for open space, park, and recreation purposes; and authorizing acquisition by condemnation.
